text: Hey team, looking to work with Sage Reed for Red Rooster. Budget is approx $6,157 - need 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Behind-the-scenes content, 3 x TV appearance. 7 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 10 months. Start date: November 2025.
